name: InventoryUnitNE
description: IM Inventory Unit Network Element resource function specification

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: id
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Used as an RDN when naming an instance of the object class.

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: neId
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Vendor defined unique identifier of a logical or physical network element unit

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: customerIdentifier
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Unique identification of a vendors’ customer

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: productName
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: NE name classifying a vendor’s product family or function

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: productType
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Identifier of the product (e.g. platform), based on different HW/SW platforms

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: salesUniqueId
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Date of Manufacture of inventory unit

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: operatorUniqueName
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Unique NE identifier used by operator

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: hWList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Carries the set of DN(s) of related InventoryUnitHw(s)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: sWList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Carries the set of DN(s) of related InventoryUnitSw(s)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: lICList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Carries the set of DN(s) of related InventoryUnitLic(s)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: mFunction
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Carries the DN of related ManagedFunction
